attributes.action: The signatories believe Lord Bramall should be issued an apology by the Police
attributes.background: Former Chief of the Defence Staff Lord Bramall (92) is a national hero who fought for his country in WW2. Scotland Yard has refused to apologise to Lord Bramall over its treatment of him during an investigation into historical child abuse. We believe he deserves an immediate and profound apology

rejection.details: This petition asks for action from the police, not the Government or Parliament.
